dcterms:description: The IRMA dataset consists of 12677 images for training and 1733 images for testing, all images classified using IRMA codes. There are in total 193 classes, each associated with a unique IRMA code used for evaluating content-based medical image retrieval performance.
dcterms:title: IRMA (Image Retrieval Medical Applications) dataset
